nodes.text: The school bus was a type of vehicle, similar to a shuttle or a starfighter, used by the Jedi Temple School District to transport Jedi Initiates and Padawans from the Jedi Temple to other locations.

One of these buses was piloted by Lobot, but the music lover cyborg, afraid by a battle droid and a lightsaber duel, has escaped, abandoning his cybernetics with a message of dimissions on the vehicle.

School buses are buses (public long-sized wheeled vehicles), in the real world, used by schools and cooperatives for transport students from a point near their houses to school and from school to the point.
Classic old school buses are yellow, like the Jedi Temple buses, this is a typical LEGO reference.
